Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for reinforcing armor.

physicsDefRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to base physical defense for this tier of reinforcement.

magicDefRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to base magic defense for this tier of reinforcement.

fireDefRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to base fire defense for this tier of reinforcement.

thunderDefRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to base lightning defense for this tier of reinforcement.

slashDefRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to base slash defense for this tier of reinforcement.

blowDefRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to base strike defense for this tier of reinforcement.

thrustDefRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to base thrust defense for this tier of reinforcement.

resistPoisonRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to base poison resistance for this tier of reinforcement.

resistDiseaseRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to base toxic resistance for this tier of reinforcement.

resistBloodRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to base bleed resistance for this tier of reinforcement.

resistCurseRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to base curse resistance for this tier of reinforcement.

residentSpEffectId1.Wiki: The ID offset applied to the armor's residentSpEffectId1 field value.

residentSpEffectId2.Wiki: The ID offset applied to the armor's residentSpEffectId2 field value.

residentSpEffectId3.Wiki: The ID offset applied to the armor's residentSpEffectId3 field value.

materialSetId.Wiki: The ID offset applied to the armor's materialSetId field value.
